title: LETS GO RIOT DONT BREAK TRADITION!
body: URFO URFO URFO URFO LETS GO

replies.body: Yesterday was no april fools day so that bot game shit was a lazy attempt at a joke considering it wasn't even 4/1. Give us the people what we want.  Now that, that's said well release a fact URF or AR-URF is the most played mode out of all the game modes.

It came out 4/1 for the Eastern Timezone. It's clever too, just look how many people were fooled by it.

Urf was only for April Fool's twice, once when it was initially released and once when they were teasing "NURF" instead. If they make it URF every April 1st then there community won't be tricked and it becomes the biggest failure of an April Fool's joke ever. 

No, at this point it's better to keep URF treated like any other featured game mode.
URF is no longer limited to April Fools, why do people not understand that.

> [{quoted}](name=Shuyin178,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ewlcP64B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-01T15:39:43.835+0000)
>
> URF is no longer limited to April Fools, why do people not understand that.

they released AR_URF with the new game modes. BUT  URF has always been around 4/1 sorry to break the news to you honey don't know many seasons you have played in!

I've played since Season 3 friend, I was around when it was 1st introduced. 
It was a prank mode to throw balance out the window for fun once, then returned the following year with more "balance". 
Since then it stopped being an AF related game mode.

Right? Happens exactly once as the event on THAT april 1, then happened again as a fake out when they were pushing the NURF mode. Thats it. It's not a tradition or something anyone is owed or should expect.
I could say the same to you. We didn't get it on time last year. They shook up the tradition last year. Get with the times.
URF on april 1st is not tradition.
